vault_ldap_auth_backend.description: Managing LDAP auth backends in Vault

url.description: The URL of the LDAP server

starttls.description: Control use of TLS when conecting to LDAP

insecure_tls.description: Control whether or TLS certificates must be validated

certificate.description: Trusted CA to validate TLS certificate

binddn.description: DN of object to bind when performing user search

bindpass.description: Password to use with `binddn` when performing user search

userdn.description: Base DN under which to perform user search

userattr.description: Attribute on user object matching username passed in

upndomain.description: The `userPrincipalDomain` used to construct the UPN string for the authenticating user.

discoverdn.description: Use anonymous bind to discover the bind DN of a user.

deny_null_bind.description: Prevents users from bypassing authentication when providing an empty password.

groupfilter.description: Go template used to construct group membership query

groupdn.description: Base DN under which to perform group search

groupattr.description: LDAP attribute to follow on objects returned by groupfilter

use_token_groups.description: Use the Active Directory tokenGroups constructed attribute of the user to find the group memberships

path.description: Path to mount the LDAP auth backend under

description.description: Description for the LDAP auth backend mount
